      • getRequestURL

        public java.lang.String getRequestURL()
        This is a replacement for the HttpServletRequest.getRequestURL() method which can be quite expensive since it returns a new StringBuffer each time the method is called.

        This method returns an ordinary String instead which is cached when the URIParser is created to improve performance.
        Returns:

      • getURI

        public java.lang.String getURI(int toPart,
                      boolean includeContextPath)
